body.class: html front not-logged-in no-sidebars page-home region-content

p.span: Following the governor’s announcement concerning the closure of school for the remainder of the year, the following information is being provided to parents, students, and community members concerning the end of the school year.

div.div: PRESCHOOL SCREENING Monday, March 2nd - Wednesday, March 4th (More Info)...
Clarkton Early Childhood Center will have spots available starting in January 2020. Please contact Tammy Ferguson at 448.3712 ext 261.

input.name: gaggle_accessibility_dyslexic
input.label: Dyslexic
input.div: Enabling this option will replace all fonts with the Open Dyslexic font.

input.name: gaggle_accessibility_contrast
input.label: High-Contrast
input.div: Enabling this option will show a high-contrast version of this site's theme.
